briefTitle: Safety and Immune Response of Novartis of MenACWY Conjugate Vaccine When Given to Healthy Children
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Observer-blind, Multi-Center Study to Compare the Safety and Immunogenicity of One Dose of Novartis Meningococcal ACWY Conjugate Vaccine With One Dose of Licensed Meningococcal ACWY Conjugate Vaccine Administered to Healthy Children 2-10 Years of Age
summary: To evaluate the safety and immune response of Novartis MenACWY conjugate vaccine when given to healthy children compared to a licensed Meningococcal ACWY polysaccharide-protein conjugate vaccine.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentages of Subjects With hSBA Seroresponse, in Healthy Children 2 to 5 Years of Age
